content:
CompSci 267P: Data Compression

  • Lectures: M W 10:00-11:20am in SST 220B     (Summer 2018)
          [ the room is reserved until 11:50am in case extra lecture time is needed ]

  • Instructor Dan Hirschberg — dan (at) ics.uci.edu
    • Office hours by appointment in DBH 4226

  • Prerequisite: An undergraduate algorithms course

  • Textbook (recommended)
    • K. Sayood, Introduction to Data Compression, 3rd edition. Morgan Kaufmann, San Francisco, 2006

  • Course Outline

  • Notes — password-protected
      • user name is your UCI ID name in ALL CAPS
      • password is your 8-character student number

  • Grading
    • no examinations
    • 50% – homework
    • 50% – term project and 10-minute class presentation

  • Class Datasets

  • Links

  • References
